overview: Lotfi, a census enumerator (counting demographics) or at least that's what he claims. Visits a neighborhood full of nutcases to interview and "count" them but everything quickly turns into a huge mess in a hilarious comedic frame full of twists about the Moroccan society..

production_companies.name: Société nationale de radiodiffusion et de télévision (SNRT)

title: Moul Ihsae
